TextBody: Goedemorgen Melissa, Dit is 2 containers geworden ipv 1 Dank Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.

Subject: D24-01768 Congelados del Cibao -> Brokeimsa
TextBody: Goedemorgen Melissa, Er zijn vier orders voor Congelados del Cibao en deze moeten alle vier op naam van Brokeimsa. De orders waren hier niet goed aangemaakt en daardoor ook niet goed aan jullie doorgegeven. Vroeger deden we voor deze klant wel op hun eigen naam, maar sinds een hele tijd al doen we alleen nog Brokeimsa. Zou je de volgende orders aan willen passen? D24-01768 D24-01769 D24-01770 D24-01771 Gaan de slot boekingen er dan uit? Kan je me op de hoogte houden? Alvast bedankt! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: D24-01771
TextBody: Hoi Melissa, Ik zie dat D24-01771 voor 27-09 gevraagd is, maar dit is de vertrekdatum van de boot. Zou deze order ook op 24-09 geladen kunnen worden? Ik had met Nathalie de afspraak dat zij alle orders altijd op de maandag zette van de gevraagde week, omdat de verkopers hier nog wel eens niet goed kijken 😉 Zou je dat heel misschien ook willen doen? Bijvoorbeeld er wordt door inkoop donderdag doorgegeven, dat jij ‘m op de maandag van die week zet. (Als dat kan wat betreft productie natuurlijk) Ik weet natuurlijk niet hoe dat bij jullie werkt en hoe Nathalie dat deed, dus geen idee of dat makkelijk is of niet. Ik hoor het graag. 😊 Dankjewel alvast! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: COMPLAINT  Ref:BX142215
TextBody: BX142215 Please quote the above reference on all correspondence 3rd September 2024 Agristo N V Fao Richard Storer Old Mill Place High Street Tattenhall Chester CH3 9PX FOR THE ATTENTION OF - Q A Dept OUTSTANDING COMPLAINT -Jacks Thin & Crispy Oven Fries 8 x 750g Details of Complaint - packs unsealed on back seam Batch Details C03241840824 1.7.26 Our records show that, to date, we do not appear to have received correspondence enabling us to conclude this matter. The complaint was originally reported to us through our branch Eastleigh 314 - Tel 02380 610816 on the 15th August 2024 Could you please ensure this matter is looked into and concluded as soon as possible. You may wish to refer to the original complaint notification when doing so. We will require copies of all correspondence to enable us to close our files. However if a copy has recently been forwarded to us, please disregard this reminder. If for any reason you are unable to comply with this request or should you have any queries relating to this matter, please do not hesitate to contact myself or a member of the Customer Relations Team. Thank you in anticipation of your co-operation. Yours faithfully Hayley Sembhi Customer Relations This is a confidential email intended only for the person it is addressed to. Booker may monitor and record all emails. The views expressed in this email are those of the sender and not Booker. Internet communications are not secure and therefore we do not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message. Booker Limited (00197380) Registered in England Registered Office: Equity House Irthlingborough Road, Wellingborough NN8 1LT. VAT Registration Number: GB 220 4302 31.

Subject: Documents 470143
TextBody: Dear all, Please find the attached file, which indicate that two PAL of the products have passed their one-year production date. We regret to inform you that we cannot accept these quantities due to their expirer . We would like to understand how it was possible for such old and near-expiry quantity to be sent to our company. Unfortunately, we are unable to sell these products, as they are consistently rejected by our customers. Also , we need you to send the CN for attached claim which have the same problem . We look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this matter.

Subject: D24-01771
TextBody: Hi Kirsten, Ja tuurlijk, normaal zet ik die steeds op maandag als jullie de week van laden doorgeven (maar ik had wat hulp om orders in te geven vorige weken). Ondertussen aangepast voor D24-01771. Pas ik dit ook aan voor D24-01767 aub? Mvg, Melissa Maekelbergh Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 14 17 45 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Planning Beemsterboer [planning@jpb.nl] Sent: 3/09/2024 10:02 To: service@agristo.com Subject: D24-01771 Hoi Melissa, Ik zie dat D24-01771 voor 27-09 gevraagd is, maar dit is de vertrekdatum van de boot. Zou deze order ook op 24-09 geladen kunnen worden? Ik had met Nathalie de afspraak dat zij alle orders altijd op de maandag zette van de gevraagde week, omdat de verkopers hier nog wel eens niet goed kijken 😉 Zou je dat heel misschien ook willen doen? Bijvoorbeeld er wordt door inkoop donderdag doorgegeven, dat jij ‘m op de maandag van die week zet. (Als dat kan wat betreft productie natuurlijk) Ik weet natuurlijk niet hoe dat bij jullie werkt en hoe Nathalie dat deed, dus geen idee of dat makkelijk is of niet. Ik hoor het graag. 😊 Dankjewel alvast! Met vriendelijke groet /

Subject: Get Ready! One-Click Audit Downloads -
TextBody: Imagine the peace of mind knowing your audit reports are ready in minutes ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ [https://gallery.eocampaign1.com/45c7d3ac-c98b-11ee-aec2-9d5b5d9db191%2Fmedia-manager%2F1711366441168-foodsafelogo%20png.png] Effortless Food Safety Compliance, One Tap At A Time! [https://gallery.eocampaign1.com/45c7d3ac-c98b-11ee-aec2-9d5b5d9db191%2Fmedia-manager%2F1711366748847-New%20HP%20Image%20PNG.png] Hi! We have some fantastic news to share! We’re thrilled to highlight our One-Click Audit Download feature, a game-changer for your compliance and audit processes. What Does This Mean for You? Customizable Audit Reports - Effortlessly compile all necessary documents and records on FOODSAFE into a single, professionally formatted PDF. Tailor your reports to meet specific audit requirements, ensuring you have everything you need at your fingertips. Effortless Sharing - Quickly email, share, or present your comprehensive audit report to auditors. This streamlined process eliminates the need for manual compilation, making your audit preparations smooth and efficient. Save Time & Stress - With our One-Click Audit Download, say goodbye to the hassle of navigating through endless data records, downloading files, and piecing them together. Our feature automates this process, significantly reducing the time and effort required. Why You’ll Love It? Imagine the peace of mind knowing your audit reports are ready in minutes, giving you more time to focus on what you do best—growing your business. No more last-minute scrambles or worries about missing documents. Our One-Click Audit Download ensures you are always prepared, enhancing your compliance management with ease. We’re excited to bring you this incredible convenience and can’t wait for you to experience it. Stay tuned for our launch! Sign up now for a chance to get early access, win free memberships and take advantage of this innovative feature designed to make your compliance journey simpler and more efficient. Sign Up Now<https://eot.myfoodsafe.co.uk/f/a/xy_5vZyRTRN2nC-Bw-_2Tg~~/AAAHUQA~/RgRouVU_P0UgNTRjOTlhMzg1ZjFjNTJhMTYwOWEyNjQ4OGY2MDkxODBEHWh0dHBzOi8vd3d3Lm15Zm9vZHNhZmUuY28udWsvVwVzcGNldUIKZs8_0NZmQxEcIVIRc2FsZXNAYWdyaXN0by5jb21YBAAAdws~> Paddy Founder & CEO The FOODSAFE Team 85 Great Portland Street London W1W 7LT United Kingdom You can unsubscribe<https://eot.myfoodsafe.co.uk/f/a/iMuqzwG-Ri6-WIxv3OMlKg~~/AAAHUQA~/RgRouVU_> at any time.

Subject: 88991 Spar FB Complaint - Crinkle Cut Chips 750g 600887
TextBody: Dear Ciara , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00046061. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Bath information: Lotcode : B04241032102 Production day : 12/04/2024 In all our production plants we have very stringent hygiene rules and measurements. All visitors, operators or working personnel have to wear hair nets and protective clothing. Also men with beards have to wear a beard net. We also have a procedure for how we have to put these on: first the hair and beard net have to be put on, afterwards the protective clothing, this is to avoid having hair on the protective clothing We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Wakefield goods in
TextBody: Morning All Due to our recent James Bridge closure all deliveries are now going to our Wakefield depot. Please can you pass the below on to your transport & your hauliers used to deliver our orders Goods in temperature delivery times below Ambient goods in times 6am to 12pm Frozen goods in times12pm to 7pm Please follow the process below when booking in an order. * All deliveries must be book in Via phone or email – Info below * If a message is left on the answer phone please leave a contact number for goods in to confirm a date/slot/ref * If an email is sent goods in will respond with a date/time/ref * No deliveries will be accepted if they haven’t booked in or if goods in haven’t confirmed a date/time/ref * The teams email/numbers are all below for any other support required. Wakefield Address Blakemore Foodservice (Wakefield) Unit 3 Premier Park Oulton Wakefield West Yorkshire LS26 8ZA Wakefield Number (0113) 2014512 Wakefield Email wakegi@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:wakegi@afblakemore.co.uk> Below is the contact information for all of my team including phone numbers & emails should you need to contact ourselves if you’re having any issues booking in orders Demand Planners Contact info Working Hours 7am to 3.30pm Name Number Email Rebecca Downie 0121 522 6321 (EXT 3356) RDownie@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:RDownie@afblakemore.co.uk> Louise Farmer 0121 526 8400 Ext 2246 LFarmer@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:LFarmer@afblakemore.co.uk> Deborah Colley (Team Leader) 0121 5226321 Ext 3636 DColley@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:DColley@afblakemore.co.uk> Team Email FoodserviceDemandPlanners@afblakemore.co.uk<mailto:FoodserviceDemandPlanners@afblakemore.co.uk>

TextBody: Good afternoon Chetna, Would it be possible to direct your questions to service@agristo.com? TextBody: Hoi Marleen, klopt wat betreft beide kroketten. 76 ton zal in 1x geproduceerd worden W39 ik heb me vergist van lijntje Groetjes, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 M +32 472 41 34 87 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Van Durmen, Marleen [marleen.van-durmen@iglo.com] Sent: 3/09/2024 13:44 To: service@agristo.com Subject: van alles Dag Marlies, Bedankt voor de vele antwoordjes al. 312705 - 96017386 Plain croquettes Zie ik dat nu goed dat het volledig gevraagd volume van 76 ton gemaakt wordt in W39 Indien wel, bedankt voor het pushen Belgische kroketten Als ik het goed zie zijn er nog 7 pal v/d Belgische kroketten 800g die nog niet op een order zitten, in de commentaar staat weekend 31/08 +/- 16 pal, ik vermoed dat dit hoort bij de lijn erboven, vermits daar nu 16 pal van in stock zijn. Dank alvast. Mvg, Marleen Marleen Van Durmen Demand & Supply Planner thread::bFvP7frNFjOxdDBxYI1He3Q::

Subject: FTP Waitrose Honey roasted parsnips
TextBody: Hello, Please find in the below email link to the final artwork. Please ensure you send to your printer to download promptly within 24 hours, or you may incur charges for a re-release of the artwork. Please send us a PDF for approval prior to plate ordering and printing. Following your first print run, please can I request that you send 8 samples of packaging for us to review. The retailers will also use these to upload your products on to their online home shopping systems. Please can you confirm both your planned print date and expected sample delivery date. Many Thanks, Jowita *** Please note the message below originated on the Internet. Subject: Réclamation qualité Sysco France / Litige n° 24,5938 - 2708824 ET 24,594 - 2708829
TextBody: Cher , Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 00047211. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations sur le batch: Date de Production: 30/06/2024 Comme il s'agit d'une réclamation répétitive sur la même production, j'ai demandé une investigation par le site concerné. Le manager de qualité de Nazareth a été informé et va étudié les réclamations. Je reviens le plus vite possible avec une réponse. Entretemps, avez-vous la possibilité de tracer les numéros de lots complèts? Maintenant le code de l'heure n'a pas été communiqué. Avec les codes de l'heure nous avons possibilité de retracer les échantillons du lot et faire une investigation approfondie. Si vous avez besoin de plus d'informations ou d'assistance, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Cordialement, Sandrine Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

TextBody: Hello Jessie, First of all We would like to thank you for this message. We'll set up the taken out of this container for September 4th. Thank you again for you attention and have a great day! Sincerely Em ter., 3 de set. de 2024 às 09:50, Faturamento - WFB <faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br>> escreveu: ---------- Forwarded message --------- De: Import - WFB <import@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:import@wfbusiness.com.br>> Date: ter., 3 de set. de 2024 às 09:34 Subject: Fwd: HAVITA/ WORLD FOOD BUSINESS - OVERVIEW FREE TIME - WEEK 36 To: <Faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:Faturamento@wfbusiness.com.br>> Segue e-mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- De: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>> Date: seg., 2 de set. de 2024 às 06:09 Subject: HAVITA/ WORLD FOOD BUSINESS - OVERVIEW FREE TIME - WEEK 36 To: import@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:import@wfbusiness.com.br> <import@wfbusiness.com.br<mailto:import@wfbusiness.com.br>>, francisco@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:francisco@goldenfoods.com.br> <francisco@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:francisco@goldenfoods.com.br>>, comex@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:comex@goldenfoods.com.br> <comex@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:comex@goldenfoods.com.br>>, anton.fechner@fedeco.eu<mailto:anton.fechner@fedeco.eu> <anton.fechner@fedeco.eu<mailto:anton.fechner@fedeco.eu>>, alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br> <alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br<mailto:alicea.esperanca@goldenfoods.com.br>> Good morning Remant just notified us that the following container is the last one for now that has to be urgently picked up at POD: WORLD FOOD BUSINESS IMP E EXP LTDA – 458319 // CBE2409715  HLBU9863500 dwelling on terminal for 38 days. This one is related to AG2820, of which we started the release this morning so I expect this one will be taken out soon as well. Finally there! Good job everyone and thank you for your cooperation on this.

TextBody: Goedendag, Bijgevoegd treft u onze inkoopbevestiging. D24-02000 – IO24-01316 - Laden week 39 -> JPB 1 kg uit voorraad laden D24-02001 – IO24-01317 - Laden week 43 Bestemming: Mauritanië Verzendadres: ETS B.M.C. Met vriendelijke groet, William Nannes J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Subject: Finished artwork is available (With colour proof)
TextBody: Dear Supplier, Project:284.23690 W47 Diepvries friet NPD's Batch 2 (3)-6. Specificaties+DT+WT has been finalised. The Low resolution PDF(s) for your information can be downloaded in a task waiting for you in the Pack module. NOTE! These files are to be used only to give you an idea of how the artwork is going to look like. They are not suitable for print. In the same task you'll see the FTP download link where you can find the High Resolution files meant for the printer. 2 colour references will be sent to you today through DHL, the tracking number is displayed in the same task. You will receive the envelope containing the colour references within 2 working days. 1 Colour reference is for your own personal use. 1 Colour reference Should be sent to your printer. (In case the projecttype is 1.2, 5.1 (or occasionally 5.2) the colour references will be send to you after approx. 4 days, this gives the printer the advantage to already start with creation of the printing plates. For these project types a separate task will appear with the Parcel tracking number). If you need any assistance please contact your FroQ project manager. Or call us at +31302476080. Please also read and follow up the print model request letter.

Subject: Food and Beverage Magazine Weekly Newsletter
TextBody: View in Browser September 3, 2024 Advertisement If you would like to contribute to F&B Weekly, please contact Lauren Kane, Director & Editor-in-Chief, via email at Lauren.Kane@fbmagazine.com or Michael Politz, Publisher, via email at michael@fb101.com. TOP NEWS Newport Harbor Island Resort Announces Jaysen Elrod as Exectutive Chef Newport Harbor Island Resort via Food and Beverage Magazine The newly reopened Newport Harbor Island Resort, a quintessential New England coastal destination and the only resort on Goat Island, announces the appointment of Jaysen Elrod to Executive Chef, effective immediately. In his new role, Elrod has overseen the re-concepting of the on-site dining outlets and will manage all culinary operations for the resort, which just underwent a $50 million renovation in time for the summer season. "We are thrilled to announce this incredibly well-deserved promotion for Chef Jaysen to Executive Chef of our culinary operations," said David Smiley, General Manager of Newport Harbor Island Resort. Read More Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer Brings Its Award-Winning Burgers and CrazyShake® Milkshakes to Brickell City Centre Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer via Food and Beverage Magazine Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer, the renowned burger establishment founded by husband and wife duo, Chris Barish and Julie Mulligan, is thrilled to announce the grand opening of its newest location in Miami on the fourth floor of Brickell City Centre. Opening on Aug. 5, Miami residents and visitors can indulge in the flavorful world of Black Tap's craft burgers, delectable wings, fresh salads, iconic CrazyShake® milkshakes, ice-cold craft beer and inventive cocktails. Black Tap Miami spans 6,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor seating to serve a combined 200 diners. Read More Advertisement BEVERAGE Archer Roose Welcomes Conley Downing as New Chief Marketing Officer Archer Roose via Food and Beverage Magazine Archer Roose, the pioneering brand within the canned wine sector, is thrilled to announce the appointment of Conley Downing as their new Chief Marketing Officer. With over 17 years of experience in the spirits industry, Downing is a passionate and versatile commercially-minded marketing leader specializing in building, nurturing and exiting early-stage brands. Read More Wines of the Presidents Food and Beverage Magazine You are what you eat ... you are what you drink. What did the presidents eat and drink? Read More Advertisement Serving up health plan solutions Promoted by United HealthCare Offering a robust health plan may help with recruiting and retaining top talent, boosting employee satisfaction and encouraging healthier behaviors in your staff. With UnitedHealthcare, you’ll find an array of flexible health plan solutions — including wellness and incentive programs. Learn More HOSPITALITY NEWS Einstein Bros.® Bagels Provides Line Relief for Parents Adding School Drop-Off Lines to Their Morning Routine Einstein Bros.® Bagels via Food and Beverage Magazine Einstein Bros.® Bagels makes the dreaded school drop-off line a bit better this back-to-school season with its "Line Relief" Free Bagel & Shmear. Rewards members will enjoy a free fresh-baked bagel and cream cheese with any purchase when they order in the app or online and skip the line. Read More World Food Championships Welcomes Bar Keepers Friend as 'Official Clean Team' World Food Championships via Food and Beverage Magazine As final preparations are being made by World Food Championships to host hundreds of amateur and professional cook teams in Indianapolis this fall, one thing is guaranteed — the Kitchen Arena will be spotless. The World Food Championships announced that Bar Keepers Friend will serve as the "Official Clean Team" at this year's event taking place Nov. 8-12 at the Indiana Farm Bureau Fall Creek Pavilion located at the Indiana State Fairgrounds & Event Center. Read More Advertisement Promoted by Bunzl Food Packaging Supplies Cleaning & Hygiene Supplies Material Handling Supplies Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) Learn More Acclaimed Tokyo Restaurants, Udatsu Sushi and Rokusho, to Launch in Los Angeles Boulevard Hospitality Group and Three Star Lane via Food and Beverage Magazine Boulevard Hospitality Group and Three Star Lane announced their inaugural collaboration, bringing two Tokyo institutions to Los Angeles. Under the direction of Hisashi Udatsu and Naotaka Ohashi, September 2024 will see two distinctive culinary and cocktail-forward destinations open within a historic former Hollywood recording studio on Sunset Boulevard. Read More Trailblazing Chef Brings Brilliance and Bold Flavors to Chicago Suburb's Culinary Scene K.C. Gulbro via Food and Beverage Magazine In the culinary world, a relentless drive for excellence and innovation truly sets the stage for the top chefs. K.C. Gulbro, renowned and nationally recognized Chef, owner of both FoxFire Restaurant and Copper Fox event venue, and Chef Ambassador for Certified Angus Beef® epitomizes this standard. His accolades, groundbreaking menu innovations, and an unwavering dedication to community engagement are reshaping the culinary landscape. Read More Advertisement The Explosive Growth of RTD Cocktails: An Industry Deep Dive — What Is the Impact? NRS via Food and Beverage Magazine The RTD cocktail market has experienced remarkable growth, capturing the attention of manufacturers, retailers and consumers. This analysis delves into the latest trends, supported by National Retail Solutions scan data, to provide a comprehensive overview of the current state and future potential of RTDs in the beverage alcohol industry. Read More The New Restaurant and Entertainment Venue at 63 CityCenter Will Feature Live Music, Southern Comfort Food, One-Of-A-Kind Memorabilia, Outdoor Patios, and a Premier Nightlife Experience Space Marks Fourth Location, Joining Nashville, Gatlinburg, Tennessee TC Restaurant Group via Food and Beverage Magazine TC Restaurant Group, a premier owner-operator of entertainment and dining destinations, is teaming up with country superstar and Academy of Country Music Artist of the Decade Jason Aldean to bring Jason Aldean's Kitchen + Bar to the Las Vegas Strip this fall 2024. TC Restaurant Group is known as the leading operator in Nashville's famed lower Broadway district and aims to deliver the best of the Music City experience to Las Vegas. Read More BeatBox Announces Expansion of Board with Industry Leaders Toby David and Christine Perich BeatBox via Food and Beverage Magazine BeatBox, a leading innovator in the ready-to-drink alcohol category, based in Austin, Texas, is excited to announce the addition of two distinguished industry leaders to its leadership team. Toby David will be joining BeatBox's Board of Directors, while Christine Perich will join as a Strategic Advisor. Read More Prize-Winning Pastry Chef Celebrates Social Change With Coffee-Inspired Creations Nespresso ZA via Food and Beverage Magazine This Women's Month in South Africa, Nespresso ZA is partnering with rising culinary star Motheba Makhetha to integrate Nespresso coffee into culinary experiences within the South African context while highlighting the exceptional talent of women in the culinary sector. Subject: Temperature Logger Reminder
TextBody: Dear partner, In the last few months, we have had some challenges with temperature loggers in the container, this includes but not limited to * missing/misplaced temperature logger * temperature logger not turned on * temperature logger only recorded first few hours since loaded The availability of a working temperature logger is very critical in maintaining the products safety and quality. Failure in compliance may delay the shipment as the products will need to be assessed internally and possibly externally, and may lead to rejection. We kindly request for you to implement a process to ensure a working temperature logger has been placed in each container. This may include supporting activity such as: * Providing evidence that the working data logger has been placed on the container by including a photo along with the shipping documents * Recording the serial number of temperature logger placed * Marking the location of the temperature logger with a bright coloured paper * Provide detail for each container or set a standard location of where the temperature logger is placed * Testing the temperature logger prior to shipment and ensure it is working properly and the battery is in good condition Thank you for your continuous support.

Failure in compliance may delay the shipment as the products will need to be assessed internally and possibly externally, and may lead to rejection. We kindly request for you to implement a process to ensure a working temperature logger has been placed in each container. Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 03.09.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 03.09.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Dear Maaike, Nice to meet you. My name is Cynthia. We are an importer in Hong Kong, Macau and mainland China and aims to provide high quality food and beverage products from worldwide. We mainly provide bulk pack for catering, western restaurant, hotel and café and small pack to retail store. You may check our company website: https://www.foodgears.com.hk/ We are now looking for potato products supply, could you let us know does your company having business partner in Hong Kong? At this moment, we did not purchase frozen potato products but we do purchase frozen cakes and fruits from worldwide. We are interested in the below items. It would be really appreciated if you could send me a soft copy of your company's catalogue, pricelist, spec, artwork/photos and please advise the MOQ and logistic information. Waffle cut fries 4x 2.5 kg 10x10 French Fries 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg 12x12 French Fries 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg 14x14 French Fries 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg Salted Crispy 9x9 French Fries 2,5kg 4x 2.5 kg 13x13 Crinkle Cut 2.5kg 4x 2.5 kg Thank you.
